text: 18.10 Ais 21.9, Dan 4.30, Lep 14.8, 18.17-19 Bin anop yul awl gɨnɨgab anɨb ak, chɨnop abe gɨnɨmuŋ tek lup agɨl, keke sɨŋadaŋ mɨdɨl agɨnɨgabal, Mel o, mel o agɨnɨgabal agak. Babilon, taun kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl anɨb ak, yep won awl nep tap tɨmel nak gɨpan tek nep gek pɨsnep apyap pakɨpan agɨnɨgabal agak.
